title: The defence of peace: lately translated out of laten in to englysshe. with the kynges moste gracyous priuilege
author: Marsilius, of Padua, d. 1342?
publicationStmtDate: and fynysshed in the moneth of Iuly in the yere of our Lorde god a. M.CCCCC.xxxv. [1535]]
publicationStmtPublisher: Prynted by me Robert wyer, for wyllyam marshall,
